Paragraph: At the same time , it could decrease the D-A nature of the polymer due to the weaker electron acceptability of DTP , resulting in the blueshift of the charge transfer bands .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| DTP (D-A nature of the polymer) |
| polymer |
| DTP (weaker electron acceptability) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| DTP |
| polymer |

I removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name":

* "it" (it is a pronoun that refers to a general thing or concept, rather than a specific material name)
* "resulting" (it is a verb that describes the action of something happening, rather than a material name)
* "blueshift" (it is a noun that refers to a phenomenon in which the wavelength of light is shifted towards the blue end of the spectrum, but it is not a material name)
